item.title: Alana encryption module, big files encryption, concurrency and performance.
item.description: Introduction Many projects on Alana Research will require an state of the art encryption so this is why an internal golang module is being built. Is built on top of golang crypto package and at the time of this writing is focused on file encryption. This article’s goal is to test its performance on “big” files, its concurrency and its multi architecture and multi platform support as well as explaining the software design decisions.
